trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around August 27th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out of my kitchen window which faces south.....Im aware of the flight patterns in my area...because I live near Philadelphia International Airport....When all of a sudden I noticed an intense bright ball of white light come from behind my tree outback, the object was lower then tree top level....I grabbed my glassed to get a perfect view of this object....when I looked at it had two white light on either side and a red light on top...none of the lights blinked....the obeject had no wings no propellors...it was a greenish brown metallic color...the closest shape I can compare it to is a hershey's kiss. It made no noise. It was so low the object it was roof top level....my home is three stories....has anyone else seen anything similar?
